reviews.review_msg: Kevin is the bomb, I love him. He actually acts HUMAN in lecture and makes jokes and stuff. Even if you don't love forensics or anything, this class killed. His exams are fair and are scaled if they are not. One of SFU's best profs, TAKE THIS CLASS.

Its clear that she reads off a slide during her lectures and goes super fast during it. Very monotoned and not engaging. Lecture discussions are presented as just participation marks but she will mark it as incomplete even if you do it if there's a component missing from the answer. Cant be bothered with material questions when TA is non responsive
